placements.summary: This text outlines various aspects of career planning and development, including placement services, associated recruiters, a placement policy, a placement brochure, and feedback from recruiters and students. It also highlights the highest performers and features a placement gallery, all managed by the Career Planning and Development Division (CPDD).
